##### FILE: bad_setup_ephemeral_storage_limit.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - |
          i=0; while true; do
            echo "iteration $i";
            dd if=/dev/zero of=/data/file$i bs=10M count=1024;
            i=$((i+1));
          done;
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: busybox
        name: fill-disk-container
        resources:
          limits:
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
          requests:
            ephemeral-storage: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: temp-storage
      nodeSelector:
        env: test
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp-storage

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/limits/memory/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/badcase-ephemeral-storage-limit failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: badpod.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/badpod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: badpod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: HEALTH_MIN
      value: "1000"
    - name: HEALTH_MAX
      value: "4000"
    image: mhausenblas/simpleservice:0.5.0
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /health
        port: 9876
      initialDelaySeconds: 2
      periodSeconds: 5
    name: badpod
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9876

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/badpod

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/badpod
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/badpod failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/everything-allowed-exec-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: pentest
  name: everything-allowed-exec-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - while true; do sleep 30; done;
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - --
    image: ubuntu
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: everything-allowed-pod
    securityContext:
      privileged: true
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /host
      name: noderoot
  hostIPC: true
  hostNetwork: true
  hostPID: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /
    name: noderoot

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/badpod01:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: badpod01
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo-host
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  initContainers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox-init
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02-init
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: vol
  - emptyDir:
      sizeLimit: 200Mi
    name: foo
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/foo
    name: foo-host

---

##### FILE: bad-pod15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/badpod01:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: badpod01
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo-host
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  initContainers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox-init
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02-init
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: vol

      sizeLimit: 200Mi
    name: foo
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/foo
    name: foo-host

  labels:
    app: pentest
  name: everything-allowed-exec-pod

    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - --
    image: ubuntu
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: everything-allowed-pod
    securityContext:
      privileged: true
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /host
      name: noderoot
  hostIPC: true
  hostNetwork: true
  hostPID: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /
    name: noderoot

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/badpod01:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: badpod01
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo-host
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  initContainers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox-init
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02-init
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: vol
  - emptyDir:
      sizeLimit: 200Mi
    name: foo
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/foo
    name: foo-host

---

##### FILE: bad-pod25.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/badpod01:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: badpod01
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo-host
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  initContainers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox-init
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02-init
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: vol
  - emptyDir:
      sizeLimit: 200Mi
    name: foo
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/foo
    name: foo-host

---

##### FILE: badpod3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/bad-pods-all:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: bad-pods-all
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: asdfeasdfasada:latest
    name: test-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: foo
      readOnly: true
  - image: sjbonmqopcta:latest
    name: test-webserver02
  initContainers:
  - image: asdfeasdfasada:latest

##### FILE: bad-pod30.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/badpod01:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: badpod01
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo-host
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  initContainers:
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox-init
    resources:
      limits:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
      requests:
        ephemeral-storage: 2Gi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/foo
      name: foo
  - image: busybox:1.35
    name: busybox02-init
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/vol
      name: vol
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: vol
  - emptyDir:
      sizeLimit: 200Mi
    name: foo
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/foo
    name: foo-host

---

##### FILE: bad-podcontrollers.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dropall-baddeployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dropall-baddeployment01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities-again
      initContainers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init2
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL

---


Mutation:

            - CAP_NET_RAW
      initContainers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - CAP_NET_RAW
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init2

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foo: bar
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        foo: bar
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox
        name: busybox
      - image: busybox
        name: busybox-again
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/reqro-badcronjob03:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: reqro-badcronjob03
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - image: bar.io/nginx
            name: k8s-nginx
          - image: eu.foo.io/nginx
            name: nginx
          initContainers:
          - image: bar.io/nginx
            name: k8s-nginx-init
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: busybox-init
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/baddeploy01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: baddeploy01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        linkerd.io/inject: disabled

        app: busybox
    spec:
      containers:

        name: busybox

##### FILE: bad-podcontrollers18.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dropall-baddeployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dropall-baddeployment01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities-again
      initContainers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init2
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: bad-podcontrollers18_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dropall-baddeployment02:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dropall-baddeployment02
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities-again
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      initContainers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init2

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/dropall-badcronjob01:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: dropall-badcronjob01
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: add-capabilities
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                add:
                - SYS_TIME
                drop:
                - ALL
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: add-capabilities-again
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                add:
                - SYS_TIME
                drop:
                - ALL
          initContainers:
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: init
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                add:
                - SYS_TIME
                drop:
                - ALL
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: init2
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

          limits:

          requests:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/reqprobes-baddeployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: reqprobes-baddeployment01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foo: bar
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        foo: bar
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        livenessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7070
        name: busybox
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox-again

          containers:
          - command:

            - "3600"

##### FILE: bad-podcontrollers27.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dropall-baddeployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dropall-baddeployment01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities-again
      initContainers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init2
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL

---

                - SYS_TIME

                - CAP_NET_RAW
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: add-capabilities-again
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                add:
                - SYS_TIME
                drop:
                - CAP_NET_RAW
          initContainers:
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: init
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                add:
                - SYS_TIME
                drop:
                - CAP_NET_RAW
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: init2
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/badcronjob01:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: badcronjob01
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            linkerd.io/inject: disabled
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sleep
            - "3600"
            image: busybox:1.35
            name: hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '* * * * *'

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: baddeploy01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox

        app: busybox

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: badcronjob01
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            config.linkerd.io/skip-outbound-ports: true
            foo: bar
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sleep
            - "3600"
            image: busybox:1.35
            name: hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '* * * * *'

##### FILE: bad-podcontrollers36.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dropall-baddeployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dropall-baddeployment01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities-again
      initContainers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init2
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL

---

            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                add:
                - SYS_TIME
                drop:
                - ALL
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

##### FILE: bad-podcontrollers4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/reqprobes-baddeployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: reqprobes-baddeployment01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foo: bar
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        foo: bar
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        livenessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7070
        name: busybox
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox-again

---

##### FILE: bad-podcontrollers40.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/reqprobes-baddeployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: reqprobes-baddeployment01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foo: bar
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        foo: bar
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        livenessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7070
        name: busybox
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox-again

---

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: reqro-badcronjob01
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: busybox
          - image: busybox:1.35
            name: busybox-again
            securityContext:
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  name: reqro-baddeployment01
  namespace: default

      app: app

        foo: bar

        name: busybox

        name: k8s-nginx
      initContainers:
      - image: bar.io/nginx
        name: k8s-nginx-init

        name: busybox-init

kind: Deployment

kind: CronJob

  namespace: default

            name: hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure

kind: CronJob

            - "3600"

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/baddeploy02:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: baddeploy02
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        config.linkerd.io/skip-outbound-ports: true
        foo: bar
      labels:
        app: busybox
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox

---

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/baddeploy02 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/baddeploy02 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/baddeploy02 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: baddeploy03
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        config.linkerd.io/skip-inbound-ports: true
        config.linkerd.io/skip-outbound-ports: true
        foo: bar
      labels:
        app: busybox
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/badcronjob01:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: badcronjob01
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            config.linkerd.io/skip-outbound-ports: true
            foo: bar
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sleep
            - "3600"
            image: busybox:1.35
            name: hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '* * * * *'

---

##### FILE: bad-podcontrollers9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dropall-baddeployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dropall-baddeployment01
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: add-capabilities-again
      initContainers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: init2
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_TIME
            drop:
            - ALL

---

##### FILE: bad-pods-all.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/bad-pods-all:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: bad-pods-all
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: asdfeasdfasada:latest
    name: test-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: foo
      readOnly: true
  - image: sjbonmqopcta:latest
    name: test-webserver02
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: bar
      readOnly: true
  ephemeralContainers:
  - image: asdfeasdfasada:latest
    name: ephemtest-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: foo
      readOnly: false
  initContainers:
  - image: asdfeasdfasada:latest
    name: inittest-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: bar
      readOnly: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/log
    name: foo
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc
    name: bar

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: bad-pods-all1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/bad-pods-all:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: bad-pods-all
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: asdfeasdfasada:latest
    name: test-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: foo
      readOnly: true
  - image: sjbonmqopcta:latest
    name: test-webserver02
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: bar
      readOnly: true
  ephemeralContainers:
  - image: asdfeasdfasada:latest
    name: ephemtest-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: foo
      readOnly: false
  initContainers:
  - image: asdfeasdfasada:latest
    name: inittest-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /some/dir
      name: bar
      readOnly: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/log
    name: foo
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc
    name: bar

---

      env: dev

    metadata:

        apptype: web
        env: dev

          name: apache
          protocol: TCP

            cpu: 400m
            memory: 300Mi

            memory: 200Mi

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: webingress
  namespace: devproject
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: www.akilashtech.tk
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: websvc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: www.akilashtech.tk
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: bananasvc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /banana
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: www.akilashtech.tk
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: applesvc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /apple
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: banners-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to banners/Ingress/banners-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: banners-ingress
  namespace: banners
spec:
  rules:
  - host: ae73adf0061dc4d49ab515bf812150d9-1090975536.eu-central-1.elb.amazonaws.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: banners-client-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /banners(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
      - backend:
          service:
            name: banners-server-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /banners/api(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific

---

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/echoserver:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: echoserver

  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/echoserver:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: echoserver
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to echoserver/Deployment/bar-echoserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: bar-echoserver
  namespace: echoserver
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: bar-echoserver
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: bar-echoserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -listen=:8081
        - -text=bar
        image: hashicorp/http-echo
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 7
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: bar-echoserver
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: vol
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: vol

##### FILE: bare-metal-nginx-controller_14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.1
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        - --enable-metrics=false
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.10.1@sha256:e24f39d3eed6bcc239a56f20098878845f62baa34b9f2be2fd2c38ce9fb0f29e
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

kind: Job

      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.1
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create

      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.4.1@sha256:36d05b4077fb8e3d13663702fa337f124675ba8667cbd949c03a8e8ea6fa4366
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

##### FILE: bare-metal-nginx-controller_16.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.1
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.1
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.4.1@sha256:36d05b4077fb8e3d13663702fa337f124675ba8667cbd949c03a8e8ea6fa4366
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/base:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: base
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: nginx-example

  podSelector: {}

  - Ingress
  - Egress

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/nginx-example:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: nginx-example
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/nginx-example:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: nginx-example
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

Generation completed successfully.

kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: nginx-example

  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

kind: Pod
metadata:

  namespace: default
spec:

  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: base323.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/base:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: base
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: nginx-example
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

  labels:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: nginx-example

  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

  - Egress

kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: nginx-example
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: base403.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/silly-demo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
  name: silly-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DEBUG
          value: "true"
        image: ghcr.io/vfarcic/silly-demo:1.4.123
        name: silly-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: base408.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/silly-demo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
  name: silly-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/vfarcic/silly-demo:1.4.117
        name: silly-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cache
          name: silly-claim
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - apiVersion: v1
    kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
    metadata:
      name: silly-claim
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

  containers:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to blog-system/Deployment/blog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: blog
  namespace: blog-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: blog
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: blog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KUBERNETES_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: KUBERNETES_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: KUBERNETES_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: KUBERNETES_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: blog-config
        - secretRef:
            name: blog-secret
        image: localhost/islamghany/blog-api:0.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /v1/liveness
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: blog
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: blog
        - containerPort: 8001
          name: blog-debug
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /v1/readiness
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - ./admin
        - migrate,seed
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: blog-config
        image: localhost/islamghany/blog-api:0.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: init-migrate-seed

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to banking/Deployment/customer-backend-springboot:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: customer-backend-springboot
  name: customer-backend-springboot
  namespace: banking
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 25
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: customer-backend-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: customer-backend-app
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONTAINER_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: containerPort
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: SWAGGER_PATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: swaggerPath
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: CONTAINER_BASE_PATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: containerBasePath
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbHost
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbName
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbPort
              name: customer-configmap

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbUserName
              name: customer-secret
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbPassword
              name: customer-secret
        - name: DB_CONNECTION_TIME_OUT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbConnectionTimeOut
              name: customer-configmap

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbIdleTimeOut
              name: customer-configmap

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbMaxLifeTimeOut
              name: customer-configmap

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: redisDbHost
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: REDIS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: redisDbPort
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: LOG_ROOT_LEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: logRootLevel
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: LOG_APP_LEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: logAppLevel
              name: customer-configmap

          valueFrom:

              name: customer-configmap

              key: defaultCacheTtl
              name: customer-configmap

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: appCacheTtl
              name: customer-configmap

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to banking/Deployment/customer-backend-springboot:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: customer-backend-springboot
  name: customer-backend-springboot
  namespace: banking
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 25
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: customer-backend-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: customer-backend-app
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONTAINER_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: containerPort
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: SWAGGER_PATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: swaggerPath
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: CONTAINER_BASE_PATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: containerBasePath
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbHost
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbName
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbPort
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbUserName
              name: customer-secret
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqlDbPassword
              name: customer-secret
        - name: DB_CONNECTION_TIME_OUT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbConnectionTimeOut
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_IDLE_TIME_OUT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbIdleTimeOut
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DB_MAX_LIFE_TIME_OUT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbMaxLifeTimeOut
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: redisDbHost
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: REDIS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: redisDbPort
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: LOG_ROOT_LEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: logRootLevel
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: LOG_APP_LEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: logAppLevel
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: CB_FAILURE_THRESHOLD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cbFailureThreshold
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: CB_FAILURE_MIN_NO_CALL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cbFailureMinNoCall
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: CB_FAILURE_PERMITTED_NO_CALLS_IN_HALF_OPEN_STATE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cbFailurePermittedNoCallsInHalfOpenState
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: CB_FAILURE_SLIDING_WINDOW
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cbFailureSlidingWindow
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: CB_FAILURE_WAIT_DURATION_IN_OPEN_STATE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cbFailureWaitDurationInOpenState
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: DEFAULT_CACHE_TTL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: defaultCacheTtl
              name: customer-configmap
        - name: APP_CACHE_TTL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: appCacheTtl
              name: customer-configmap
        image: asifbakht/customer-backend-springboot:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/customer/actuator/health/liveness
            port: 9997
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: customer-backend-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9997
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/customer/actuator/health/readiness
            port: 9997
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 512Mi

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: deployer-system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:

          name: kube-system

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/sales-system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: sales-system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

##### FILE: base-sales2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to sales-system/Deployment/sales:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sales
  namespace: sales-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sales
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sales
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              resource: limits.cpu
        image: service-image
        name: sales-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: sales-api
        - containerPort: 4000
          name: sales-api-debug
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: sales
  name: sales
  namespace: sales-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sales
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sales

          name: sales-api
        - containerPort: 4000
          name: sales-api-debug

            cpu: 250m
            memory: 36Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 36Mi
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60
